name: Office Kiss: Edge of Humanity 日本人じゃない
name_original: Office Kiss: Edge of Humanity 日本人じゃない
description:
How to Play

Hold down the left mouse button to kiss

The longer you kiss the more kisses you get

Use kisses to buy modifications

Buy all four modifications to win

If He sees you, then he will be angry and you do not get the kisses

If He sees you three times, then you will lose

---

Made ~3 days for VimJam 2

All Art/Code by Jet Simon

SFX from freesound.org

Idea inspired by a text message from Ngân Hoàng

M to mute
